resources.string: Memory card removed. Functions about profile photo, images, voice messaging and video are not available
There is not enough space left for your memory card, which will effect audio, photo and video features on Weixin.
"Network problem occurred. Do you want to report your network server? Submitted content does not contain any personal privacy."
"WiFi network problem. Please try GPRS network. Change settings now?"
Failed to access server (%d,%d). Please check your network or try again later
Network unavailable. Please try again later
Really want to delete chat history with %s?
Really want to delete Drift Bottle history with %s?
Really want to delete group chat history?
"%s rejected to join the group chat "
You have disable messaging of the account %s
You have disabled Weibo Messages. You will not be able to send and receive private messages from Tencent Weibo.
You have disabled QQ Message and will not receive QQ offline messages.
%s is a Weibo account, to which you can only send private messages
Back up your address book to protect your data
"% use friend request verification. Your friends need to accept your request before joining the group chat. Do you want to send friend requests now?"
"% uses friend request verification. Your friend need to accept your request before joining the group chat. Do you want to send a friend request now?"
Invalid QQ password. Please enter again
Invalid QQ ID. Please enter again
The email address is not available
The email address has been registered to Weixin; please try another one
System busy. Please try again later
"6-20 letters, numbers, '_' or '-', must begin with at least one letter"
Weixin ID cannot include Chinese characters
%s cannot be used as Weixin ID
9 or more digits required for a number-only password
Password must be: at least 6 or more combination of digits and characters; Or at least 9 digits
Wrong verification code. Please enter again
"Weixin provides an easy way to send voice messages. Just download it at http://weixin.qq.com/m. Don't forget to add me %s"
Scan my QR code and say hi to me.
"Loading failed. Please visit http:\\\\weixin.qq.com to download the latest version"
Version too old. Please update first
"Don't have QQ ID? Sign up with phone number"
Login with QQ ID or Weixin ID
Weixin ID: can not be changed
The Weixin ID is not available. Please try another one.
The QQ ID is in use.
Invalid nickname; please try another one
This QQ ID has expired to use. Please renew or change another one.
"Input the Weixin ID you apply for 6-20 letters, numbers, '_' or '-', must begin with a letter."
Your friends will find you by your Weixin ID.

"Once registered, your Weixin ID can not be changed Please confirm your information
QQ ID: %s Weixin ID: %s"
Enter name. Let your friends identify you.
E-mail address:Please verify within 15 days after registration.
You can login to Weixin with your phone number and find contacts using Weixin. We will not disclose your phone number to any others.
Enter name. Let your friends identify you.
Please enter your phone number to get a message containing the link to reset password.
Request sent. Please check the SMS in your mobile
Invalid account or password. Please enter again
Email address not verified. You can only login with Weixin ID.
Clear all Tencent Weibo private messages
You will not receive new message if you exit Weixin. Do you want to continue？
Your account logged in at another location.
Click the title bar to go back to the top
"It's being repaired for part of services."
Adjust the volume with button on the side of your phone
Someone wants to add you as a friend
Recommend a QQ friend for you
Recommend a friend in your phone contact
Invalid QQ password. Please enter again
This QQ ID has expire to use.
Are you sure to clear all histories in this plug-in?
Hold a text message with Emoji and add it to your EmoijArt.
You have no Tencent Weibo ID
You need to link your QQ ID to continue. Link it now?
It supports only Tencent Weibo (begin with t.qq.com)
History data will be cleared when you uninstall the plug-in.
If it is disabled, the stranger whom you reply to will not be added to your address book automatically
No one can see your Tencent Weibo ID if you choose to disable.
The number of Office Email has reached the maximum that you can add.
You can edit settings of Tencent Weibo here
It will not delete any data. You can still login with this account
Set the time to receive notifications about plug-in messages
It may increase data consumption. Really want to change it?
Statistics data will not be recovered once deleted. Do you want to continue?
Pick a name that is easy to remember
The new email address should be verified
"6-20 letters, numbers, '_' or '-', must begin with at least one letter"
Weixin ID: can only be modified once

"Weixin ID can be modified only once, please confirm:
Old ID: %s New ID: %s"
The message for verification has been sent. Please login to your mailbox to verify.
The email address has been registered to Weixin. Please try another one.
The email address has been registered to Weixin. Please try another one.
Add Office Email to find your colleagues, and save them as Weixin contacts.
The number of Office Email has reached the maximum that you can add.
The following domains are not supported: @qq.com, @gmail.com, @163.com, etc.
The email format is incorrect. Please enter again
Email under this domain has been verified
Once verification is finished, your colleagues will be displayed in your Weixin contact list.
Really want to delete your office mailbox?
"Can't find the SD card.Only the first two chat background available."
Select your country and region code
Really want to block this person?
This person is now blocked from sending you messages
Delete the contact %s and conversations with him/her
Really want to report this user
Thanks for your report. We will investigate if the user has violated our policy.
Be sure to clear all records?
Be notified when new mail arrives. Check and reply instantly.
You will not receive any push mail if you disable this function.
Clear your location info to avoid people from finding you.
Recommend you the QQ and mobile contacts who have joined Weixin, and send friend requests to you.
Find mobile contacts who are using Weixin
Find QQ contacts who are using Weixin
Receive and reply QQ offline messages.
When you disable QQ Messages, online QQ status would be off. Aure you sure to do that?
QQ Messages will be enabled while QQ online status is on. Are you sure to do that?
Send and receive private messages of Tencent Weibo.
Back up your mobile contact list to the server to protect your data.
Try throwing a bottle to send your message. Also pick one up to see what others have to say.
Show people using this function within your area (1km).
Shake your mobile to add people who are shaking as well.
Record your voice, as well as text, photo and video.
You need to link your QQ ID or QQ Mail account to continue. Want to link it now
View your QQ friends who has joined Weixin
You need to link your QQ ID to continue. Link it now?
Deliver your messages to recipients individually
You cannot add yourself to contact list.
Share to Tencent Weibo and QQ Private Message
Send the Weixin name card to Tencent Weibo, Pengyou and Qzone
Send the Weixin name card to Sina Weibo
Save your Weixin name card to the album and send it to your friends
The verification may take a while. Please wait.
You have disabled Address Book Matching
Failed to disable Address Book Matching (%d,%d)
Use your address book to find friends on Weixin
Weixin will send a verification message to your phone and complete all the rest automatically.
"Your phone number: %s Enter verification code sent to your phone."
Do you allow Weixin to upload your address book? Your data will be encrypted
Fill in your Weixin ID and the password set on registration.
You will not know which mobile contacts are using Weixin; your phone address book data on our server will be deleted.
Operation too frequent. Please try again later
For now Weixin does not support registration via phone numbers in your country or region.
You can not unbind your phone if you didnot bind qq
This phone number is not linked
The phone number is already in use
"Invalid verification code Please check and enter again"
"Verification code expires Go back and reload the verification code"
"Address Book Matching is enabled. You can now find who is on Weixin. Your phone number: %s"
You can link it again in Settings
Phone number %S is not verified. Really want to delete it?
Link your QQ ID to find QQ contacts on Weixin. With your QQ ID linked, you can use QQ plug-ins
Once established, the linkage between QQ ID and Weixin ID cannot be cancelled. Really want to continue
The QQ ID has been linked to another Weixin ID. please try another one.
This QQ ID has expired to use. Please renew or change another one.
You have linked your QQ ID and can use related plug-ins to find more friends.
"I'm using #Weixin# which allows voice messaging. Just download and install it at http://weixin.qq.com. Don't forget to add me: %s"
Enable address book matching to find more friends on Weixin
Link your QQ ID to find QQ contacts on Weixin
Send a friend request, you two can connect if it is accepted.
Failed to add: you have been blocked by the other user
Video just taken will be discarded
Video just taken will be discarded
Failed to send: video file error. Please record again
The video message is not supported on your device.
You are not in wifi condition,to continue will cost you a lot of traffic.
URL found:%s Do you want to visit?
"Scan the QR code to say hi to him(her)! Your Weixin ID won't be disclosed to the others."
"Share your QR Code to %s. Someone may say hi to you. Your Weixin ID won't be disclosed publicly."
You have not linked your QQ ID yet.
I am using #Weixin# on mobile. Chatting with voice messages is fun! Scan the QR code below to \"Weixin\" me! You can download #Weixin# at: http://weixin.qq.com/QR/
Put the QR Code within the frame. You could also scan other non-Weixin QR codes.
Put the QR Code within the frame. The system will identify and find your contact automatically.
QR code for coupons and discounts
Says hi to you from QR Code
You are forbiden to use this function temporarily since you have been reported for many times.
